#summary Instructions for installing Slinker on the Mac platform

== Installation: == 
To install Slinker on your Mac you will have to:
  # Open a Terminal window, browse to Slinker's folder
  # Go to the 'src' folder and inside create a new 'bin' directory
  # Go to 'bin' in the Terminal and run the following commands from inside that directory:

{{{
cmake ~/Desktop/Slinker-0.1.0-Source
}}}
(adapt the path to point to Slinker's folder)

{{{
make
}}}

{{{
./Slinker
}}}
(to launch Slinker)
